articles.title: The day I discovered the Everton contract Revie never signed
articles.summary: This is the story of how an unsigned contract that lay hidden in a bungalow for more than 50 years could have changed the course of English football.

articles.summary: English football's independent regulator will review 'parachute payments' to relegated clubs as part of its report into the men's professional game.

articles.title: Rashford scores but Barcelona suffer shock defeat

articles.summary: Match of the Day pundit Joe Hart says Everton players and fans are right to be "frustrated" by their disallowed goal against Aston Villa, it was the correct decision.
